Title: DS3231 RTC
Description: Firmware to control the real time clock IC from Maxim; DS3231SN.   Designed to run under Arduino bootloader.
HomeWiki: Real time clock firmware based on the DS3231 RTC chip. Please ensure that you refer to datasheet, http://datasheets.maximintegrated.com/en/ds/DS3231.pdf Communication is via I2C using wire.h.
